item.title: Kevin Kelly's Hacking 和 《列子天瑞》的盗亦有道
item.description: 凯文凯利在《失控》中有一句话： The nature of life is to delight in all possible loopholes. Every creature is in some way hacking a living by reinterpreting the rules. 生
